Account

Step one of the signup form for new customers.

...plus 3 minutes free!

Have a promo code?

Promo code 654123 applied. Change code.

Invalid code.

Password must be at least one letter and one digit, minimum 6 characters.

<form role="form">
  <label>Select an offer </label>
  <div class="arrange arrange-equal arrange-gutter">
    <div class="arrange-fit">
      <label for="30min" class="enrollment-plan-option selected">
        <b>30 Minutes</b> for $<span class="price-amount">30.00</span>
        <input type="radio" name="signupOffer" value="30" id="30min" checked />
      </label>
    </div>
    <div class="arrange-fit">
      <label for="20min" class="enrollment-plan-option">
        <b>20 Minutes</b> for $<span class="price-amount">20.00</span>
        <input type="radio" name="signupOffer" value="20" id="20min" />
      </label>
    </div> 
    <div class="arrange-fit">
      <label for="10min" class="enrollment-plan-option">
        <b>10 Minutes</b> for $<span class="price-amount">10.00</span>
        <input type="radio" name="signupOffer" value="10" id="10min" />
      </label>
    </div> 
  </div>  
  <h3 class="text-primary text-center u-no-margin">...plus 3 minutes free!</h3>
  <p class="help-block"><a class="promo-link" href="#">Have a promo code?</a></p>
  <p class="help-block promo-code hidden">Promo code <strong class="code-slot">654123</strong> applied. <a class="change-promo" href="#">Change code</a>.</p>
  <div class="form-group promo-group hidden arrange arrange-gutter">
    <div class="arrange-fill">
      <input type="text" class="form-control" id="signupPromo" placeholder="Promo code" />
      <p class="help-block has-error hidden">Invalid code.</p>
    </div>
    <div class="arrange-fill">
      <button class="btn btn-primary apply-btn">Apply</button>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div class="form-group form-group-required">
    <label class="form-label" for="signupName">Your name</label>
    <input type="text" class="form-control" id="signupName" />
  </div>
  <div class="form-group form-group-required">
    <label class="form-label" for="signupEmail">Email address</label>
    <input type="email" class="form-control" id="signupEmail" />
  </div>  
  <div class="form-group">
    <div class="checkbox">
      <label for="signupOptIn">
        <input type="checkbox" checked="checked" id="signupOptIn" /> Yes! Sign me up for News and Promotions, so I can start earning <a href="#">Membership Rewards</a> towards my readings
      </label>
    </div>
  </div>  
  <div class="form-group form-group-required">
    <label class="form-label" for="signupPassword">Choose a password</label>
    <input class="form-control" id="signupPassword" type="password" placeholder="Password" />
    <p class="help-block">Password must be at least one letter and one digit, minimum 6 characters.</p>
  </div>
   <div class="form-group form-group-required">
    <label>Gender</label>
    <div class="form-group arrange arrange-gutter">
      <div class="radio arrange-fit">
        <label>
         <input type="radio" value="female" checked="checked" /> Female
        </label>
      </div>
      <div class="radio arrange-fill">
        <label>
          <input type="radio" value="male" /> Male
        </label>
      </div>
    </div>  
    
  </div>  
   <div class="form-group form-group-required">
    <label class="form-label" for="signupDOB">Date of birth</label>
    <input type="date" class="form-control" id="signupDOB" />
  </div>
   <div class="form-group">
    <button class="btn btn-primary">Next step <span class="arrow-right"></span></button>
  </div>
</form>




<script>

$('#signupPassword').showPassword('focus');


$('.promo-link').each(function () {
  var $link = $(this);
  var $form = $link.closest('form');
  var $group = $form.find('.promo-group');
  var $code = $form.find('.promo-code');
  var $error = $group.find('.has-error');
  var $promoinput = $group.find('#signupPromo');
  
  $link.click(function (e) {
    e.preventDefault();
    $group.removeClass('hidden');
  });

  $group.find('.apply-btn').click(function (e) {
    e.preventDefault();
    var code = $group.find('#signupPromo').val();
    if (code.match(/^\d{6}$/)) {
      $group.addClass('hidden');
      $link.addClass('hidden');
      $error.addClass('hidden');

      $code.find('.code-slot').text(code);

      $code.removeClass('hidden');

      // Update prices
      $form.find('.price-amount:not(.discounted)').each(function () {
        var $price = $(this);
        var newPrice = $price.text() * 0.75 + "";
        var place = newPrice.indexOf('.');
        $price.text(newPrice + ".00".slice(newPrice.length - (place > 0 ? place : newPrice.length)));
      }).addClass('discounted');
    }
    else {
      $error.removeClass('hidden');
      $promoinput.addClass('has-error');
    }
  });

  $form.find('.change-promo').click(function (e) {
    e.preventDefault();

    $group.removeClass('hidden');
  });
});

;
</script>

Billing

Step two of the signup form for new customers.

Billing Information

  • Visa
  • MasterCard
  • Discover
  • American Express
  • Diner's Club

Conditions of Sale and Payment Terms

To purchase any goods and/or services on our website, You must be (a) at least eighteen (18) years of age or the applicable state age of majority, whichever is older (b) a natural person (no corporations, partnerships or other legal entities. Prior to the purchase of any services on our website, You must provide us with a valid credit card number and associated payment information including all of the following: (i) your name as it appears on the card, (ii) your credit card number, (iii) the credit card type, (iv) the date of expiration and (v) any activation numbers or codes needed to charge your card. By submitting that information to us, you hereby agree that you authorize us to charge your card at our convenience but within thirty (30) days of credit card authorization.

Methods of Payment, Credit Card Terms

All payments must be made by VISA, MasterCard, American Express, Discover or Diners club (each of which may be removed by PsychicSource.com in its sole discretion). Unless expressly set forth on the PsychicSource.com site, we do not accept any other payment form. If we offer or accept any other form of payment, You hereby agree to all restrictions, terms and conditions associated with such additional form of payment. Your card issuer agreement governs your use of your designated card, and you must refer to that agreement and not this Terms of Use to determine your rights and liabilities as a cardholder. YOU, AND NOT PsychicSource.com, ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR PAYING ANY UNAUTHORIZED AMOUNTS BILLED TO YOUR CREDIT CARD BY A THIRD PARTY. You agree to pay all fees and charges incurred in connection with your purchases at the rates in effect when the charges were incurred. Unless you notify PsychicSource.com of any discrepancies within thirty (30) days after they first appear on your credit card statement, you agree they will be deemed accepted by You for all purposes. If PsychicSource.com does not receive payment from your credit card issuer or its agent, You agree to pay all amounts due upon demand by PsychicSource.com or its agents.

Order Acceptance Policy

Your receipt of an electronic or other form of order confirmation does not signify our acceptance of your order, nor does it constitute confirmation of our offer to provide service. PsychicSource.com reserves the right at any time after receipt of your order to accept or decline your order for any reason. All payment information must obtain pre-approval with an acceptable method of payment, as established by our credit and fraud avoidance department. We may require additional verifications or information before accepting any purchase.

Charges on your credit card will appear as Expert Link, Inc. You will receive a confirmation email after completing the next step.

<script>
$('.toggle-trigger').click(function (e) {
  e.preventDefault();

  var $trigger = $(e.target);
  $trigger.toggleClass('active');
  $($trigger.attr('href')).toggleClass('hidden');
});
</script>

Signup Footer

Footer for the signup form.

Questions?

Call 1.800.965.3049 to reach our Customer Care Representatives. Our Customer Care Center is not outsourced or overseas, and is there to help you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. You can also chat online with one of our friendly Customer Care representatives.

Safety and security at Psychic Source

Psychic Source is committed to protecting your privacy and uses some of the most sophisticated security software commercially available. We respect your privacy and are committed to no spam. Your information is safe with us.
